about_the_game:
Please note: RELO is still in development, so screenshots don't show the final game.

RELO is a puzzle programming game where you use trains to solve problems they really weren't meant for.

Highlights:
  • Discover and master an unconventional train-based logic system.
  • Explore programming concepts presented in a whole new physical way. (Who knew a for-loop would be an actual loop!)
  • Unlock a variety of parts to solve even the most complex challenges.
  • Get your solution working without limitations, or optimize your solutions for speed, cost, or both!
  • Enjoy a minimalist cute aesthetic and smooth animations
